author: Unreal Engine
description:
Find out how Cory Williams produces videos starring the Silly Crocodile character for his wildly popular Just For Kids YouTube channel with just himself, some imagination, and Unreal Engine.

Read more about his process as a solo dev on the project in our blog post on the Unreal Engine website!

#sillycrocodile #justforkids #animation #unrealengine
title: Cory Williams’ Silly Crocodile | Spotlight | Unreal Engine

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Watch this session recorded at Unreal Fest Orlando 2025 and find out about the UE5 streaming improvements for dense worlds showcased in The Witcher 4 Unreal Engine 5 Tech Demo.

You’ll learn about the significant improvements that have been made to performance in UE 5.6 when streaming static content in and out at runtime. With the Fast Geometry Streaming Plugin (Experimental), you can have a greater amount of immutable static geometry in your worlds that will load faster with constant frame rates. Additionally, all projects will benefit from further improvements over content streaming such as asynchronous physics state creation and destruction.

Learn more about Unreal Engine 5.6 here: www.unrealengine.com/news/unreal-engine-5-6-is-now-available

#TheWitcher4, #TechDemo, #Streaming, #FastGeometryStreamingPlugin, #UE5.6, #GameDevelopment, #UnrealEngine, #UE5, #UnrealFestOrlando
title: Streaming Improvements for Dense Worlds in The Witcher 4 UE 5 Tech Demo | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Watch this video from the ‘Motion Design in Unreal Engine’ series, in which Nick Jushchyshyn (AKA Pixel Prof) explores the creation of shapes.

You’ll get a look at how to create various shapes using Unreal Engine’s Motion Design toolkit, including how to add color, light, and animate them. 

Don’t miss the next instalment of this Motion Design tutorial series! To learn more about Motion Design in Unreal Engine, check out the Epic Developer Community: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/unreal-engine/motion-design-in-unreal-engine

#MotionDesign, #UnrealEngine, #UE5, #PixelProf
title: Motion Design in Unreal Engine, Episode 05: Shapes
